commands.name: add
commands.help: Returns the sum of two numbers.

commands.name: subtract
commands.help: Returns the result of subtracting 'b' from 'a'.

commands.name: add_item
commands.help: Adds an item to the cart with its price.

commands.name: remove_item
commands.help: Removes an item from the cart.

commands.name: calculate_total
commands.help: Calculates the total cost of all items in the cart.
